thread.section_title: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ingram's Water & Air Equipment | ingramswaterandair.com
thread.title: Kurt Greisiger
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Kurt Greisiger

author: Kurt Greisiger
title: Kurt Greisiger
text:
Product was exactly as specified and complete upon arrival. Delivery was sooner than expected, well packaged and exceeded expectations.
I would recommend Ingrams to other contractors.
Account sales person was polite and prompt returning e-mails and calls to coordinate delivery and verification of items included in system.
